attributes.action: Demand UK Government successfully negotiate Peace Treaty between Palestine & Israel Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
The United Kingdom citizens strongly demand the current British Government facilitate a Peace Treaty to be negotiated (for Peace) between Israel and Palestine, with a successful outcome, and facilitate an immediate cease fire between the two countries of Palestine and Israel.

It is our belief that our Government has the skills, the fortitude, morality, and the finances to negotiate peace and should have the skill to arrange an immediate peace treaty for both Palestine and Israel.

We request that you do not favor Palestine or Israel above the other, but treat both countries as equals.

The United Kingdom citizens expect and demand the Government to carry out the wishes of the population of the United Kingdom, and reflect our view on this matter around the world.
